speech: Neck Blast chawal ki ek serious fungal disease hai jo Magnaporthe oryzae fungus ki wajah se hoti hai.
Is bimari mein plant ke neck ya panicle (dhan ki gali) par brown ya blackish lesions ban jati hain.
Severe infections ke case mein dhan ka sara panicle sukha aur toot jata hai, jo yield ko drastically kam kar deta hai.
Neck Blast zyadatar warm aur humid climates mein zyada hoti hai, especially jab excessive nitrogen fertilizer use kiya jaye.
Is disease ko control karne ke liye resistant chawal varieties ka istemal karein aur timely fungicides spray karein.
Irrigation aur fertilizer ka sahi management bhi Neck Blast ko control karne mein madadgar hota hai.
